zakatCalculator.heading: Learn How to Calculate Your Zakat al-Maal

paragraph1.normal: quickly using our easy calculator. Determine your due Zakat on gold, silver, savings, and more. Our tool follows the latest Nisab standards to keep everything in line with Islamic guidelines.

zakatCalculator.paragraph2: After calculating, you can confidently give to sustainable initiatives supporting the most vulnerable. Your Zakat will reduce poverty, boost education access, and strengthen healthcare for those who need it most. Together, change is possible.
